ValidationRule.description: If Primary Quote is not approved and dually signed, you cannot change a direct opportunity to closed won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c = FALSE, ISCHANGED(StageName) , ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Won'),
RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_DIRECT, Primary_Quote__r.RecordType.Name = 'eBay Advertising',
Primary_Quote__r.Dually_Signed__c = FALSE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot change stage to Closed Won if Primary Quote is not approved & dually signed
